name: Ed Bowman
review: Sound biblically exegeted exposition with an up to date application that inspires God's worship and healthy fellowship. Highly recommended for folks who desire True truth and a caring relationship in helpful community.

name: Leroy H
review: Praise God for Redeemer OPC. What a wonderful flock! Highly recommended.

name: Rick Arendale
review: Excellent preaching and faith based service
